ygData.subject: My wedding
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, My wedding on Brell Serelis will be at 8:00pm PST on Friday the 12th of November (tomorrow).  The wedding will take place on the Sisters of
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone,

My wedding on Brell Serelis will be at 8:00pm PST on Friday the 12th
of November (tomorrow). The wedding will take place on the Sisters of
Erollisi island. It will be a fully catered event! All list members are
welcome.

The best way to get to the island is to take the boat from freeport. You
should allot 15 minutes for boat travel. If you're coming from Faydwer,
I recommend you just wait for the boat to start coming back, rather than
jumping ship and trying to swim.

If you are of an evil race, you can still attend, as festivities will be held
a safe distance from the good NPCs on the island. Please don't kill the
Erollisi sisters.

- Christina
